name: Ribbit
summary: A modern social networking platform built with Jetpack Compose
description: Ribbit is a modern social networking platform where users can share thoughts, ideas, and connect with others in meaningful ways. Built with the latest Android technologies including Jetpack Compose and Material Design 3.
author: Tekkadan

Thread vs Topic reply filters in notifications
Open thread or topic from notification with correct reply chain
